name: Hawthorn Bancshares, Inc.
description: Hawthorn Bancshares, Inc. is a bank holding company that provides a range of financial services through its subsidiary, Hawthorn Bank. Established in 1865 and headquartered in Jefferson City, Missouri, the company serves customers primarily in central and western Missouri. Hawthorn Bank offers a variety of banking products including personal and commercial loans, checking and savings accounts, and mortgage services. The bank is committed to delivering excellent customer service and building lasting relationships within its communities. In addition to traditional banking services, Hawthorn Bank provides wealth management, investment services, and insurance products, catering to the diverse financial needs of individuals and businesses. With a focus on community involvement, Hawthorn Bancshares actively participates in local events and supports various charitable organizations, reinforcing its dedication to the economic growth and development of the areas it serves. The company is also focused on leveraging technology to enhance its offerings, including online banking and mobile app services, making banking more accessible for its customers. Through strategic growth initiatives and a focus on customer satisfaction, Hawthorn Bancshares aims to solidify its position as a leading community bank in the region.

seo.meta_title: Hawthorn Bancshares, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Hawthorn Bancshares, Inc., a leading community bank providing a comprehensive range of banking and financial services in Missouri. Discover our commitment to customer satisfaction and community development.

faq.question: What services does Hawthorn Bank offer?
faq.answer: Hawthorn Bank offers banking services including checking and savings accounts, loans, and wealth management.

faq.question: Where is Hawthorn Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Hawthorn Bancshares is headquartered in Jefferson City, Missouri.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hawthorn Bancshares?
faq.answer: Shawn R. P. Henson is the CEO of Hawthorn Bancshares, Inc.
